attributes.background: Since the introduction of allowing EU citizens to use the NHS for free over 20 years ago, a debt has grown in the form of the NHS losing its funding year on year and drastically failing the UK population. We need to claim this money back and reinvest it to make the NHS a service to be proud of again

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
